title: Please, help me what to buy.
body:
I currently have 2,925 Riot Points, and I am having a very hard time deciding on what/who to get.

So, here are the options I have come up with:

Skins - Winter Wonder Soraka, Odyssey Sona and Program Nami.

"Your Shop" skins - Deep Sea Nami, Moo Cow Alistar, Star Guardian Janna and PROJECT: Leona.

Chromas - Rainbow Winter Wonder Soraka, White Odyssey Sona, Pink Program Nami, and Yellow Moo Cow Alistar.

Champions - Thresh, Zyra and Rakan. 

Thank you if you have chosen your picks.

{{sticker:sona-playing}}

replies.body:
I would not buy Chromas or Champions since both are available with Blue essence at some point.

Go with a skin you like, or just sit on it until a skin you like is on sale. I'd personally never pay full price for a skin and I own plenty.
I cannot see the Blue Essence prices on Chromas, were they available at a limited time event?

Sometimes we have the [essence emporium](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088-The-Essence-Emporium-FAQ) where people with excess can by limited emotes, gemstones and chromas for BE. Chromas older than a year are usually included. In my opinion its better to wait to pay for chromas in BE rather than RP.

Though the ruby chromas now are usually exclusive to the chroma bundles, and so aren't ever available in the BE shop. Assuming the bundles are not time limited (those for non-legacy skins), you can buy out the other chromas for BE, then purchase just the ruby from the bundle. 

You also can't get some Emerald chromas which you can't buy at all, but rather get from codes from content creators (EG Infernal Amumu, WW Neeko).
Moo chow bro the bell taunt is goooood
This new year will have lots of new champs you save it for one you may like.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Personally, I'd pick WW Soraka and Program Nami, but it depends a lot on what you play.

My advice, is to pick the skins you like for the champions you play the most. Don't make the mistake I did early on of spending loads of RP on skins that you love, but will never use because you don't play the champ. 

If you get good skins in your "your Shop" with a >50% discount, that's the place to buy them, as you'll more than likely never see them cheaper. 

For new skins, if you aren't super impatient like me, or especially if it's not a skin for someone you play all the time (which for me only covers 3-4 champs), wait for those early sales.

I would offer the same advice as the others, and leave chromas and champs to buy with BE. I spent RP on champs real early on, and it was never really worth it, certainly not if you've never played them on free to play weeks.

Do not buy champs or chromas with RP, that's just a waste considering you can get a champ whenever, and the essence emporium opens for chromas every now and then.

Can't make a call on the "your shop" skins, since you didn't tell us the percent off you're getting

Of those 3 skins, none of them are good, don't waste money on them
